attributes.title: TERRIBLE DONT DOWNLOAD  i wish i could give it 0 stars

attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.title: Orange Clown
attributes.review: App is very easy to download and open but definitely far too difficult for his supporters to figure out. They probably should have sent coloring books with crayons for his shrinking legion of cretins. One star! And I‚Äôd leave zero if I could.
